channel.title: CVE Feed for cservit -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cservit -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1851|2024-08-01T18:56:22.141Z -- cservit -- affiliate-toolkit%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20affiliate%20plugin
item.description: The affiliate-toolkit – WordPress Affiliate Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on the atkp_create_list() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.5.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to to perform unauthorized actions such as creating product lists.

item.title: CVE-2024-2298|2024-06-04T17:29:32.586Z -- cservit -- affiliate-toolkit%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20affiliate%20plugin
item.description: The affiliate-toolkit – WordPress Affiliate Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on the atkp_import_product() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.5.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to to perform unauthorized actions such as creating importing products.

item.title: CVE-2024-1851|2024-06-04T17:59:26.844Z -- cservit -- affiliate-toolkit%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20affiliate%20plugin
item.description: The affiliate-toolkit – WordPress Affiliate Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on the atkp_create_list() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.5.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to to perform unauthorized actions such as creating product lists.
